    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The air mixture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Luftmischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mélange d'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A mistura do ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La miscela dell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μίγμα αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La mezcla del aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the different gases that compose the air we breathe.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water vapour</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die unterschiedlichen Gase,
die die Luft bestehen, die, wir atmen. Dieses kann in einer 
beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les différents gaz qui 
composent l'air que nous respirons. Ceci peut être utilisé 
dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra os gáses diferentes que 
compõem o ar que nós respiramos. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i gas differenti che 
compongono l'aria che respiriamo. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ότι τα διαφορετικά αέρια
που συνθέτουν τον αέρα αναπνέουμε. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los diversos gases que 
componen el aire que respiramos. Esto se puede utilizar en un 
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
